Title: The Frozen Turkey Man
Description: For a joke, Compo and Clegg convince a barmaid that Foggy is a multi-millionaire.

Title: The White Man's Grave
Description: The trio have Clegg stand in for Wally in an attempt to give Wally a few hours' freedom.

Title: The Waist Land
Description: Foggy attempts to earn some ready cash by smuggling junk food to some health farm inmates.

Title: Cheering Up Ludovic
Description: Clegg is roped in to drive a van when an old friend is too drunk to use it.

Title: The Three Astaires
Description: The trio help out at a church concert, but Compo is more interested in a suit of armour.

Title: The Arts of Concealment
Description: Foggy lands himself in trouble with a group of local cyclists when he demonstrates his supposed skill at camouflage.
